definition.name: Debug with ssh
definition.description: This GitHub Action enables direct interaction with the host system running your GitHub Actions via SSH
definition.author: Owen Ou

inputs.name: limit-access-to-actor
inputs.description: If only the public SSH keys of the user triggering the workflow should be authorized

inputs.name: limit-access-to-users
inputs.description: If only the public SSH keys of the listed GitHub users should be authorized

inputs.name: upterm-server
inputs.description: upterm server address (required), supported protocols are ssh, ws, or wss.

inputs.name: ssh-known-hosts
inputs.description: Content for ~/.ssh/known_hosts file on the server

inputs.name: wait-timeout-minutes
inputs.description: Integer number of minutes to wait for user to connect before shutting down server. Once a user connects, the server will stay up.
